event_summary: International renewable energy expo featuring solar, wind, and hydrogen technologies with exhibitions from 40 countries.
commentary_summary: Environmental experts highlighted the event's role in accelerating global transition to clean energy solutions.
next_event_plan: Add dedicated pavilion for emerging battery technologies and energy storage solutions
event_highlight: Launch of revolutionary solar panel with 30% efficiency rating
event_object: To promote sustainable energy solutions and connect renewable energy industry stakeholders
event_conclusion: Generated $2.5 billion in potential business deals and signed 50 international cooperation agreements
event_conclusion_overall: Outstanding success in promoting renewable energy adoption with record-breaking attendance
next_event_suggestion: Create startup pitch competition for clean energy innovations
